review.author: DevOps
findings: Chunk 1: activity/usage/message-state rewired through resolveCoordPath. Backup include paths coord-root-aware.
Chunk 2: Legacy fallback warning telemetry verified — warns once per file when workspace/ used while .hivemind/ exists.
Chunk 3: ROLES.md canonical role source verified. CLAUDE.md/GEMINI.md/CODEX.md are thin quirk-only shims.
Chunk 4: All 10 tracked instance files deleted. Empty dirs locked by running processes — cleared on restart.
Chunk 5: Integration guard test prevents coordination path joins escaping resolveCoordPath wrappers.
Cross-model: Ana (Gemini) reviewed all 5 DevOps (Codex) chunks. 3235/3235 tests green.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
